channel.title: Necropolis Village

item.title: Necropolis Village
item.content:encoded:
A new Hidden Village has been born in the depths of the Catacombs - join the Necropolis for power beyond your wildest imaginings!

We are looking for members, so make an application today!

Necropolis Village - The Village hidden in the Catacombs.

Seradesh
